description: This header file defines the IOttServices interface, which specifies virtual methods for handling permissions, tokens, and ping operations related to OTT services within the WPEFramework project.

classes.name: IOttServices
classes.description: An interface for OTT services providing methods for permission management, token retrieval, and health check (ping).

methods.name: Ping
methods.description: Send a message to the service and receive a pong response.

methods.name: GetPermissions
methods.description: Retrieve permissions for a specified application as a JSON array string.

methods.name: InvalidatePermissions
methods.description: Invalidate cached permissions for a specified application.

methods.name: UpdatePermissionsCache
methods.description: Update the permissions cache for a specified application by fetching from the remote service.

methods.name: GetDistributorToken
methods.description: Retrieve a distributor/platform token for a specified application.

methods.name: GetAuthToken
methods.description: Retrieve an authentication token for a specified application.

ctags.name: IOttServices
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IOttServices : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
